scenario_text.value:
There’s nothing here.
Let’s check somewhere else.
Why does Ryo always say such awful things?

Because he’s scared. He probably doesn’t know
who or what to trust.

Well, I wouldn’t say that, but I do trust you
and the others.

After all, we wouldn’t be able to protect
ourselves without your help.

I guess not... But you know, I’m glad you
rely on me, Takuma.

Honestly, I don’t know what I’d do without
you. Now let’s go find that food!
I’d do anything for you, Takuma!
